name: Entrance Exam
description:
Uncover the mystery of your sister's disappearance hidden in a derelict computer. As you browse files, find secrets, and complete an obscure Entrance Exam, you may find that the computer has plans of its own. 

Playable as a Windows 10 virtual machine.

Design: Rachel Jiang and Eli Bork

Art/Music: Rachel Jiang

Programming: Eli Bork
